trans-unit.source: The result returned by the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動傳回的結果。

trans-unit.source: Provides an approach that is consistent with the document object model (DOM), which constructs activities dynamically that interface with the WF designer and workflow runtime using <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供與文件物件模型 (DOM) 一致的方法，該模型會使用 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor" />，動態建構與 WF 設計工具和工作流程執行階段互動的活動。

trans-unit.source: With <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> you can create new activities without creating new types.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601>，您不需要建立新型別，即可建立新活動。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> with its associated XAML support in <xref:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.ActivityXamlServices> allows new arguments to be defined in XAML and bound by the host without requiring XAML to be compiled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> 及其在 <xref:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.ActivityXamlServices> 中相關聯的 XAML 支援，允許在 XAML 中定義新引數並由主機繫結，不需要編譯 XAML。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicActivity`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicActivity`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of attributes of the dynamically generated activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得動態產生之活動的屬性 (Attribute) 集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of attributes.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 (Attribute) 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Validation.Constraint" /> activities that are configured to provide validation for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicActivity`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Validation.Constraint" /> 活動的集合，這些活動是為了提供 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicActivity`1" /> 的驗證所設定。

trans-unit.source: The constraint collection.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the execution logic of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定活動的執行邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The execution logic.
trans-unit.target: 執行邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the implementation version of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定活動的實作版本。

trans-unit.source: The implementation version of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的實作版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name to be displayed for the activity in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得活動要顯示於工作流程設計工具中的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The activity name.
trans-unit.target: 活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of properties that map to the arguments of the dynamically generated activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性 (Property) 集合，該屬性對應至動態產生之活動的引數。

trans-unit.source: The collection of properties.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of attributes of the dynamic activity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回動態活動的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: The attributes of the dynamic activity.
trans-unit.target: 動態活動的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the class name of the dynamic activity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回動態活動的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: 類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the component name of the dynamic activity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回動態活動的元件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The component name.
trans-unit.target: 元件名稱。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: Returns a type converter for the dynamic activity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回動態活動的型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: A type converter for this dynamic activity instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個動態活動執行個體的型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default event for the dynamic activity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回動態活動的預設事件。

trans-unit.source: The default event.
trans-unit.target: 預設事件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: Returns the default property for the dynamic activity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回動態活動的預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default property.
trans-unit.target: 預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The base type of the editor you want to find.
trans-unit.target: 您要尋找之編輯器的基底型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns an editor with the specified base type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定基底型別的編輯器。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the editor that can be cast to the specified editor type, or <see langword="null" /> if no editor of the requested type can be found.
trans-unit.target: 編輯器的執行個體，可以轉型為指定的編輯器型別，如果找不到要求型別的編輯器，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events of the dynamic activity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回動態活動的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events of the dynamic activity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回動態活動的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of events.
trans-unit.target: 事件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: An array that you can use as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 做為篩選條件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events of the dynamic activity using a specified array of attributes as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性陣列做為篩選條件，傳回動態活動之事件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of events that match the specified attributes.
trans-unit.target: 符合指定屬性的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: An array that you can use as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 做為篩選條件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of properties of the dynamic activity using a specified array of attributes as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性 (Attribute) 陣列做為篩選條件，傳回動態活動之屬性 (Property) 的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of properties that match the specified attributes.
trans-unit.target: 符合指定屬性 (Attribute) 的屬性 (Property) 集合。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: The property whose owner is to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找擁有者的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicActivity`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicActivity`1" /> 類別的這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This instance of <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicActivity`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicActivity`1" /> 的這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `pd` parameter is ignored by this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會忽略 `pd` 參數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is present to implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會用於實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面。
